document.full_text: the nfl will not hesitate in handing out suspensions for illegal hits next season and will propose a series of rule changes at next week's owners meetings to help bring down the injury rate on kickoffs.
document.title: league discusses rule changes to make kickoffs safer
lines_and_colors: the nfl will not hesitate in handing out suspensions for illegal hits next season and will propose a series of rule changes at next week's owners meetings to help bring down the injury rate on kickoffs.
